title: D.C. attorney general files lawsuit against Amazon, alleging stolen tips
description: The lawsuit alleges that Amazon used deceptive methods to lead consumers to believe that tip money went directly to drivers, when it was actually being used to subsidize wages.

title: Apple says it will allow iCloud backups to be fully encrypted
description: The one service Apple offered that could not be encrypted was iCloud. Now that will change.

title: Elizabeth Holmes’s former Theranos business partner faces sentencing
description: Sunny Balwani, the former president and COO of the infamous blood testing start-up, faces possible prison time following his conviction on 12 fraud-related charges.

title: The pandemic made work holiday parties weird. How to navigate yours.
description: Experts weigh-in on whether the pandemic created new rules for company holiday parties, including virtual ones

title: Margaret Atwood, Stephen King rally around new author after no-shows at signing
description: "We've all been there," best-selling novelists told debut author Chelsea Banning after her book signing attracted only two people.

title: San Francisco bars police from using killer robots, reversing recent vote
description: The city was criticized by civil libertarians after it last week voted to give law enforcement the right to deploy armed robots in a small number of scenarios.

title: Wordle is 2022’s top Google search term, above both Ukraine and the queen
description: Wordle beat out terms like “Election results” and “Jeffrey Dahmer” in the U.S. and “Ukraine” and “Queen Elizabeth” globally.
